description: LegacyGPT is an FLOSS web application based on <0>Better ChatGPT</0> that recreates the ChatGPT interface in its early days.
sourceCode: <0>You can find the source code here!</0>

support.title: Support me!
support.paragraph1: LegacyGPT is maintained by one person, as Better ChatGPT hasn't received commits in a long time.
support.paragraph2: If you like LegacyGPT, you can support me by giving the repository a star on GitHub and spreading the word.
support.paragraph3: If you would like to support the team that is working on Better ChatGPT, consider sponsoring us through one of the methods below. Every contribution, no matter how small, helps us to maintain and improve our service.

privacyStatement.title: Privacy Statement
privacyStatement.paragraph1: LegacyGPT does not collect or store text that you enter or receive from pollinations.ai in any form. The LegacyGPT source code is available for viewing to confirm this claim. However, pollinations.ai publishes all public requests in its text generation feed, so keep that in mind.
